abstract: The Dalai Lama explores the interface of contemplative and scientific approaches to environmental challenges.
snippet: The Dalai Lama explores the interface of contemplative and scientific approaches to environmental challenges.
lead_paragraph: Early this week, I heard through some e-mail traffic that 10 climate, behavioral and environmental scientists and scholars were meeting with the Dalai Lama to discuss "ecology, ethics and interdependence" -- a mix at the core of this blog. The meeting is part of a continuing series of discussions on the interface between contemplative and scientific approaches to humanity's challenges. Here's one of a string of taped segments:

headline.main: On Climate, Ethics, Cow Burps and the Dalai Lama
